stories.text: How do you find funds to invest in? There are more funds than stocks out there. I have a 5 year investment horizon, and are willing to take on a large risk.
stories.title: Ask HN: How do you find funds to invest in?

stories.text:
I'm afraid that IT is quite aversive to employees of older ages. I do not seek to understand why and to what extent that is true but I am starting to bump into it.

I think though that there might be specific tech stacks and business domains that might be less aversive to older age and even actively seeking employees in age brackets of > 40 yrs old.

So, the question is, you have seen such patterns?

Thanks
stories.title: Ask HN: Which tech stacks and business domains are more age-friendly in IT?
